pullrequest.title: Display real time factor in the time widget

content.html:
How about putting the RTF below the other widgets, in the center like this:

This is the diff:

diff -r fc605ba9d82f examples/config/time.config
--- a/examples/config/time.config       Fri Jun 01 15:33:25 2018 -0700
+++ b/examples/config/time.config       Mon Jun 04 09:43:10 2018 -0700
@@ -12,6 +12,7 @@
   <world_stats>
     <sim_time>true</sim_time>
     <real_time>true</real_time>
+    <real_time_factor>true</real_time_factor>
     <topic>/world_stats</topic>
   </world_stats>

diff -r fc605ba9d82f src/plugins/TimePanel.cc
--- a/src/plugins/TimePanel.cc  Fri Jun 01 15:33:25 2018 -0700
+++ b/src/plugins/TimePanel.cc  Mon Jun 04 09:43:10 2018 -0700
@@ -219,13 +219,15 @@

             if (hasRTF)
             {
+              auto rtfLabel = new QLabel("Real Time Factor");
+              mainLayout->addWidget(rtfLabel, 2, 0, 1, 2);
+              mainLayout->setAlignment(rtfLabel, Qt::AlignRight);
+
               auto rtf = new QLabel("N/A");
               rtf->setObjectName("realTimeFactorLabel");
               this->connect(this, SIGNAL(SetRealTimeFactor(QString)), rtf,
                   SLOT(setText(QString)));
-
-              mainLayout->addWidget(new QLabel("Real Time Factor"), 1, 4);
-              mainLayout->addWidget(rtf, 1, 5);
+              mainLayout->addWidget(rtf, 2, 2);
             }
           }
         }
